title: Unit 3 Lesson 2: Parallel Architecture 2
description:
• Evaluate a loop to see if it is a candidate for parallelization using a vector architecture.
  • Predict performance of a loop on a vector architecture.
  • Employ Fosterâ€™s methodology (see: Designing and Building Parallel Programs, by Ian Foster, available at: https://www.mcs.anl.gov/~itf/dbpp/ ) for designing parallel programs for a given architecture
